ygData.subject: Re: Finding a staff
ygData.msgSnippet: You ll be hard pressed to find someone that sells a worn weapon regularly, normally they are only sold after someone sold one to them.  just keep shopping
ygData.messageBody:
You'll be hard pressed to find someone that sells a worn weapon regularly,
normally they are only sold after someone sold one to them. just keep
shopping around, eventually someone will sell one.

Along the same lines though, I've been using a giant snake fang for a good
chunk of my career <till level 8> and i'm wondering if i should start
working on my staff skill. are the later better weapons all staff based, or
are there some good high level necro usable daggers out there? I just don't
want to wait too long and have my staff skill near impossible to get up.
also, one handed or two handed staves? with my luck i'll take a two hander
and all the magic necro staves will be one handed <grins> anyhow, that's it
from me for a while.


Cyrissa, Veeshan level 8.
